title: IHOF releases the Caffe Family
content:
For Immediate Release  
Buffalo, NY- June 1st, 2009

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619225910im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CaffeFlag_5345.jpg.jpeg)

P22 and the International House of Fonts announce Caffe- a new flavorful  
font designed by Gabor Kothay.

Caffe was originally designed for the Artz Gallery Cafe in Budapest  
Hungary. The design is a contemporary handwriting style adapted from  
examples in lettering exercise books. It has been redrawn and expanded into  
six styles. The four weights were created by drawing the style using  
different mediums: Cappuccino in pen, Pastry in felt-tip, Lemonade in brush  
and Tobacco, the original, in pencil. Poster and Poster Inline are well  
suited for display purposes and round out the family. This font family is  
perfect for bistro menus or other European-flavored poster & print design.

[http://www.p22.com/ihof/caffe.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619225910/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/caffe.html "http://www.p22.com/ihof/caffe.html")

Introductory offer through June 30th
author: Miss Tiffany
